Row.Text: Settlements built adjacent to Navigable Rivers gain +2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on River Terrain, but Cities not built adjacent to a Navigable River receive -10%[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food.

[BLIST][LI]Settlements built adjacent to [B]Navigable Rivers [/B]gain [B]+2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food [/B]on [B]River Terrain[/B], but Cities [B]not [/B]built adjacent to a [B]Navigable River [/B]receive [B]-10%[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food[/B].[LI][B]+30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing [B]Serpent Mound[/B].[/LIST]
+30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being the Shawnee's associated Wonder.
